[..monetd] $ giverny help network add

giverny network add

Usage:
  giverny network add [network_name] [node_name] [moniker] [flags]

Flags:
      --generate-pass       generate pass phrases
  -h, --help                help for add
      --initial-ip string   IP
      --no-save-pass        don't save pass phrase entered on command line
      --pass string         filename of a file containing a passphrase

Global Flags:
  -g, --giverny-data-dir string   Top-level giverny directory for configuration and data (default "/home/martin/.giverny")
  -m, --monet-data-dir string     Top-level monetd directory for configuration and data (default "/home/martin/.monet")
  -v, --verbose                   verbose messages
